categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ascercia was a Human male who served in the military of House of Thul during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, he and Sergeant Virne went on a mission to install a prototype Imperial sensor array until their party was was attacked by Killiks and the Imperials that carried the sensors were killed and cocooned to the hive. They tasked an Imperial individual to help recover the sensors. Their commanding officer was Major Pharoth.
